caption:
Here’s how this usually goes…

First—Bitcoin moves.
The king wakes up.
It takes the spotlight, and the world starts paying attention again.

Then—Ethereum follows.
Usually.
But this time? It’s still sleeping.
Which means… you’re still early.

Then comes the altcoin pump—
Not the little bounce we saw last year.
The real alt season.
The one where solid projects explode 10x, 20x, even more…
and portfolios double overnight.

After that, the market breathes.
It cools off.
People get shaken out.
Some give up too soon.

But the smart ones?
They wait.

Because next comes the microcaps.
The forgotten gems.
The ones no one was talking about—
until they 50x.

And sometimes, the memes go nuclear.
(Though this cycle’s been weird—memes moved early. Still… it’s not over.)

Then—comes the crash.
The correction.
The reality check.
It’s brutal. And it wipes out the greedy.

And maybe… just maybe…
it takes the world with it—
into recession, by the end of 2026.

But here’s the truth:
Every step of this cycle is predictable—if you know what to look for.
And every step is a chance to change your future.

Imagine using this next run to…

🔥 Pay off your debt
🔥 Buy your freedom
🔥 Help your family
🔥 Buy back your time and take a gap year from work 
🔥 Build real wealth for your future

That’s the real power of crypto.

And yes—it can feel overwhelming.
Wallets. Coins. Security.
What to buy, when to sell, how not to get wrecked…

I get it.
That’s why I built my Crypto Academy—
To walk you through it all, step by step.

If you want to build a portfolio the right way—
DM me or click the link in my bio to get started.

You’ve just been given the roadmap.
Now it’s time to decide:
Will you watch it happen again… or finally take the wheel?
